docs.text: 搭建MkDocs并部署到Github Pages Installation Install python check if Python and Python package manager, pip is installed. C:\Users\Kevin>python --version Python 3.11.6 C:\Users\Kevin>pip --version pip 24.0 from C:\Program Files\Python\Python312\Lib\site-packages\pip (python 3.12) Install mkdocs pip install mkdocs check if mkdocs is installed C:\Users\Kevin>mkdocs --version mkdocs, version 1.6.0 from C:\Program Files\Python\Python312\Lib\site-packages\mkdocs (Python 3.12) Install git check if git is installed C:\Users\Kevin>git --version git version 2.44.0.windows.1 Creat MkDocs Build mkdocs new [dir-name] - Creat a new project in desired file path. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server, visit 127.0.0.1:8000 to see the local site. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. A new folder "site" will be generated to be deployed. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. File structure mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. site/ # The site ... docs/ CNAME # The self-defined domain file. index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. dir/ # if nacessary, new folder is supported. index.md ... Configration The mkdocs.yml file: site_name: Liuwk Docs theme: readthedocs # MkDocs support theme of 'mkdocs' and 'readthedocs' extra_javascript: # To enable latex, a html file is nacessary. - https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.4/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML markdown_extensions: # To include extension of 'python-markdown-math' - mdx_math: enable_dollar_delimiter: true # To enable inline equation $...$ Deploy Github Pages Creat a new public repo, repository name should be username.github.io . In the root path of your mkdocs folder git init # initial git git remote add origin https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git mkdocs dh-deploy # This command will creat a gh-pages branch and push content to it. Once the content changes, run command mkdocs build && mkdocs dh-depoly . Latex test Inline equation: \left( \sum_{k=1}^n a_k b_k \right)^2 \leq \left( \sum_{k=1}^n a_k^2 \right) \left( \sum_{k=1}^n b_k^2 \right) . Block equation: \begin{vmatrix} a & b\\ c & d \end{vmatrix}

docs.text: The mkdocs.yml file: site_name: Liuwk Docs theme: readthedocs # MkDocs support theme of 'mkdocs' and 'readthedocs' extra_javascript: # To enable latex, a html file is nacessary. - https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.4/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML markdown_extensions: # To include extension of 'python-markdown-math' - mdx_math: enable_dollar_delimiter: true # To enable inline equation $...$
docs.title: Configration

docs.text: Creat a new public repo, repository name should be username.github.io . In the root path of your mkdocs folder git init # initial git git remote add origin https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git mkdocs dh-deploy # This command will creat a gh-pages branch and push content to it. Once the content changes, run command mkdocs build && mkdocs dh-depoly .
